document_data.name: Jaal
document_data.mainbody: '''Jaal''' was a [[stone giant]] living in [[Gracklstugh]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], the Stonespeaker [[Hgraam]] may have sent Jaal to guide an expedition led by some [[adventurer]]s, who'd been hired by [[Bruenor Battlehammer]] to investigate the threat of a [[demon lord]], to the mystic library of [[Gravenhollow]].
document_data.Abilities: Jaal had a mystical connection to the [[Underdark]] rocks and stopped often to touch the stones to commune with them, allowing him to find the quickest and safest path through the Underdark.
